import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { CreditCard, Clock, CheckCircle, XCircle, DollarSign, Calendar, Filter, Search, MoreVertical, Eye, Edit3 } from 'lucide-react'; const ManagePayments = () => { const [payments, setPayments] = useState(null) const [filter, setFilter] = useState('all'); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const updatePaymentStatus = (paymentId, newStatus) => { setPayments(prev => prev.map(payment => payment.id === paymentId ? { ...payment, status: newStatus } : payment ) ); }; const getStatusIcon = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'paid': return ; case 'pending': return ; case 'offline': return ; default: return ; } }; const getStatusBadge = (status) => { const baseClasses = "px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium"; switch (status) { case 'paid': return `${baseClasses} bg-green-100 text-green-800`; case 'pending': return `${baseClasses} bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800`; case 'offline': return `${baseClasses} bg-red-100 text-red-800`; default: return `${baseClasses} bg-gray-100 text-gray-800`; } }; const filteredPayments = payments.filter(payment => { const matchesFilter = filter === 'all' || payment.status === filter; const matchesSearch = payment.customer.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || payment.email.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || payment.id.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()); return matchesFilter && matchesSearch; }); const totalAmount = filteredPayments.reduce((sum, payment) => sum + payment.amount, 0); const offlineCount = payments.filter(p => p.status === 'offline').length; const pendingCount = payments.filter(p => p.status === 'pending').length; return (
{/* Header */}

{/* Stats Cards */}

Total Amount

{payments.length}

{/* Filters and Search */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="pl-10 pr-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent" />
Showing {filteredPayments.length} of {payments.length} payments
{/* Payment List */}
{filteredPayments.map((payment) => ( ))}
Payment Details Customer Amount Date Status Actions
{payment.id}
{payment.description}
{payment.method}
{payment.customer}
{payment.email}
${payment.amount.toFixed(2)}
{payment.date}
{getStatusIcon(payment.status)} {payment.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + payment.status.slice(1)}
{payment.status === 'offline' && ( )} {payment.status === 'pending' && (
)}
{filteredPayments.length === 0 && (

No payments found

Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.

)}
); }; export default ManagePayments
